Lang.SavePreset: Save current settings to selected preset
Lang.HelpTip: Move mouse on any control for help.
Lang.cbMode: Choose how the color of the shadow blends with the color of the underlying object.
Lang.ShadowColor: Click left mouse button to choose the drop shadow color. Click right mouse button to convert the color to another model.
Lang.sOpacity: Adjust the transparency of the drop shadow.
Lang.sDistance: Set the distance between the drop shadow and an object.
Lang.sFeather: Sharpen or soften the edges of the drop shadow.
Lang.PresetsList: Double click on a preset item to load drop shadow settings.
Lang.loadBtn: Load settings from drop shadow object.
Lang.AddBtn: Save current settings as new preset.
Lang.CreateBtn: Create a new drop shadow for selected objects.
